name: Telefonica Global Solutions
description: Telefonica Global Solutions is a subsidiary of Telefónica, S.A., which is headquartered in Madrid, Spain. The company focuses on providing a wide range of telecommunications services and solutions to businesses globally. Founded in 2011, it has established itself as a key player in the telecommunications sector. Telefonica Global Solutions offers services that include international connectivity, cloud solutions, and cybersecurity. The company leverages advanced technologies to enhance its offerings, although specific technologies and intellectual property details are not disclosed in the sources. Its target customer segments encompass multinational corporations and enterprises across various industries. Geographically, Telefonica Global Solutions operates in multiple markets, providing services worldwide. The business model primarily revolves around B2B (business-to-business) services, generating revenue through contracts and service agreements with clients. Major clients include large enterprises that require robust telecommunications infrastructure and support. The company has formed strategic partnerships to enhance its service delivery and expand its market reach. Recent strategic moves include the continuous development of its service portfolio to adapt to evolving market needs. The exact headcount of employees is not specified in the sources. Publicly stated financial metrics such as Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR), funding, valuation, and revenue figures are also not provided. Competitors in the telecommunications space include other global telecom providers, although specific competitors are not mentioned in the sources. Overall, Telefonica Global Solutions plays a significant role in the telecommunications landscape, focusing on delivering innovative solutions to its clients.
